name: Baby Cot
description: Client (M/57) is currently unemployed and has chronic medical conditions. He lives in a 2 room rental flat with a family of 5. The family is facing financial hardship and is struggling to afford functional appliances. For further details, feel free to reach out to Kritikaa at 8777 0959 or email to kritikaa.subramaniam@thkmc.org.sg to liase. Thank you.

name: Baby Cot
description: Expectant parents living at 21 Jalan Tenteram are preparing for the arrival of their newborn and require a baby cot or playpen to ensure a safe sleeping space. The couple currently does not own a cot and cannot afford one due to financial constraints and ongoing medical bills. The mother is due on 20 November 2025, and the family wishes to create a safe and stable environment for the baby’s care and rest.

passiton.name: Baby cot

name: Diaper
description: Client is a single mother, currently unemployed with no income. She has 5 children aged 10 years, 9 years, 8 years, 7 years, and 8 months old. She is in need of diapers (MamyPoko Tape Diaper - M size) for her 8 months old child.

name: Sofa
description: A family of seven, including five young children aged 6 months to 8 years old, needs a sofa for their 2-room rental flat after their previous one broke and had to be discarded. With the father working as a food delivery rider as the sole breadwinner and the mother actively seeking employment to support the household, the family faces significant financial challenges in replacing this essential furniture for their small living space.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Tampines, Punggol  & Pasir Ris
contact.name: Ken Toh

passiton.name: 3 seater Sofa
passiton.description: 3 Seater sofa to be donated at the end of Nov. Some cat scratches at the sides, but generally in ok condition.

passiton.name: Donation of Solid Wood Sofa Set (3+1+1) – Jurong East
passiton.description:
I would like to bless and donate a solid wood sofa set (3-seater + two 1-seaters) in good, usable condition through the Pass-It-On programme.

Item details:

Origin: Zen Tradition

Material: Solid, heavy wood with firm cushion seats

Condition: Gently used, structurally strong, minor wear on fabric edges

Includes: Main seat cushions only (small decorative cushions in photo not included)

Colour: Beige-gold fabric with dark wood frame. I will also include an additional spare set of cushion covers in red too

Quantity: 1 set (3 + 1 + 1)


Pickup details:

Location: Jurong East (lift accessible)

Preferred collection: By end of Oct (flexible on timing)

I can assist with coordination for movers or charity pickup. By the way, need to arrange for movers because only my elderly parents in the house.

name: Geriatric chair
description:
Senior is recently diagnosed with cancer, and is going through many rounds of chemotherapy and oral chemo. Family members expressed stress in caring for the senior. He needs a geriatric chair to be placed at home for ease of treatment. 
Please contact 96885403 for Jane Tan for further liaising
